snippet.title: Gameplay Trailer | South Pole Bebop-Demo | Wishlist Now
snippet.description:
Play Into The Breach-inspired multiplayer game with friends and wishlist it on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2184470?utm_source=youtube

This is a turn-based strategy PvPvE game where you assemble the almighty warriors of the South Pole on a 9x9 grid, strategically distribute their powers, fortify Antarctica, and unleash your forces upon the dual threats of the undead and a rival player. It is ITB-inspired.

Join our Discord for more content, updates, and announcements: https://discord.gg/cF8H2B5vxR
Follow South Pole Bebop:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/southpolebebop
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@southpolebebop
Sentience Game Studio: https://www.sentience.rocks/

#SouthPoleBebop #indiegame #trailer #officialtrailer #gameplay #indiegames #steam #turnbased #pvp #singleplayer #multiplayer #gaming #games #strategy #rpg #upcoming
